tool.name: Sickle
tool.description: Window Adaptive Trimming of FastQ data
tool.command:
sickle $readtype.single_or_paired --quiet
#if str($readtype.single_or_paired) == "se": -f $input_single -t $qual_type -o $output_single #end if
#if str($readtype.single_or_paired) == "pe": -f $input_paired1 -r $input_paired2 -o $output_paired1 -p $output_paired2 -s $output_paired_single -t $qual_type #end if
#if str($qual_threshold) != "": -q $qual_threshold #end if
#if str($length_threshold) != "": -l $length_threshold #end if
2> /dev/null

data.name: output_paired1
data.label: Paired-End forward strand output of ${tool.name} on ${on_string}

data.name: output_paired2
data.label: Paired-End reverse strand output of ${tool.name} on ${on_string}

data.name: output_paired_single
data.label: Singletons from Paired-End output of ${tool.name} on ${on_string}
